law.catch_line: Cabinet to develop process for evaluating information when determining whether to approve privatization contract -- Administrative regulations.

text.section: The Finance and Administration Cabinet shall develop an objective and systematic process for evaluating the information in KRS 45A.551(2) and (3) for use in determining whether to approve privatization of a government service.
The process shall be adopted by administrative regulation promulgated by the Finance and Administration Cabinet in accordance with KRS Chapter 13A.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 492, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998.
